title: Looking for 5s team can play any role gold/plat
body: Played amateur last season for team Ignite, scrimming tops teams like YSSC. have taken a 6 month break from playing and came back and got placed in gold. just want to have fun playing 5s with some mates and see what happens. add me in game or msg me here pls

replies.body:
IGN Wolves
Can play anything role but mid is the least fav

Hi there i am keen to join your team i am currently diamond 5 not that desperate for going up just playing norms most of the time, my ign is kikkoo and further details will be given if added :) cheers :)
Hey I'm Frost and my team is most plat with a couple of previous diamond players and would love to trial you if your willing to give your Skype over we can discuss further
hay frost any chance of a trail if so add me looking to enhance my gaming further
